duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead end-to-end feature and AB testing efforts through execution of roadmap: pre-analysis, feature design/specs, collaborate with dev and QA teams, design and set up AB tests, post analysis, and repeat
Manage game configurations to carry out and measure in-game monetization and content strategies
Use analytics to find new opportunities and make recommendations for improvements; this can include new user flow, UA/marketing, IAP/ads merchandising, content, technical performance, and more

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Analytics, Product Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
